meanings.sent1: She cowrites stories with her best friend.

meanings.definition: The act of writing together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: Their cowrites always turn out amazing.
meanings.sent2: The cowrites between the two poets are always inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The collection of cowrites in the book is quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her cowrites with different authors showcase her versatility.
